original_text: You have done more evil than all who lived before you. You have made for yourself other gods, idols made of metal; you have aroused my anger and turned your back on me.
korean_text: 네 이전 사람들보다도 더 악을 행하고 가서 너를 위하여 다른 신을 만들며 우상을 부어 만들어 나를 노엽게 하고 나를 네 등 뒤에 버렸도다

sentences.original_text: than all who lived before you.
sentences.korean_translation: 너보다 먼저 살았던 모든 사람보다 더욱 그러하였다

sentences.original_text: You have made for yourself other gods,
and turned your back on me.
